It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifndef PB_DS_EXCEPTION_HPP 42 #define PB_DS_EXCEPTION_HPP 43 44 #include <bits/c++config.h> 45 #include <stdexcept> 46 #include <cstdlib> 47 48 namespace __gnu_pbds 49 { 57 struct container_error : public std::logic_error 58 { 59 container_error() 60 : std::logic_error(__N("__gnu_pbds::container_error")) { } 61 }; 62 66 struct insert_error : public container_error { }; 67 70 struct join_error : public container_error { }; 71 73 struct resize_error : public container_error { }; 74 75 inline void 76 __throw_container_error() 77 { _GLIBCXX_THROW_OR_ABORT(container_error()); } 78 79 inline void 80 __throw_insert_error() 81 { _GLIBCXX_THROW_OR_ABORT(insert_error()); } 82 83 inline void 84 __throw_join_error() 85 { _GLIBCXX_THROW_OR_ABORT(join_error()); } 86 87 inline void 88 __throw_resize_error() 89 { _GLIBCXX_THROW_OR_ABORT(resize_error()); } 91 } // namespace __gnu_pbds 92 93 #endif
